閜字的基本解释

閜
xiǎ
裂开：“谽呀豁閜。”
大杯：“小之为杯，大之为閜。”

閜
kě
〔閜砢（
弯腰：閜腰。k?）〕重叠倚靠的样子，如“坑衡閜閜，垂条扶疏。”

閜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiǎ］
［《廣韻》許下切，上馬，曉。］
亦作“閕1”。
(1)开阔貌。
(2)大杯。
[②]［ě］
［《集韻》倚可切，上哿，影。］
见“閜2砢”。

閜字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　閜； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1333第28
【唐韻】火下切【集韻】許下切，?音㗿。【說文】大開也。【廣韻】大裂。【博雅】閜，開也。【史記·司馬相如傳】谽呀豁閜。【註】閜，呼下反。索隱曰：豁閜，空虛也。　又【說文】大杯亦爲閜。【揚子·方言】閜，桮也，其大者謂之閜。【博雅】閜，杯也。【釋文】呼雅切。又【集韻】倚可切。同?。【說文】門傾也。或省。【史記·司馬相如傳】阬衡閜砢。【郭璞註】閜，惡可反。阬衡閜砢揭孽傾敵貌也。【漢書註】閜，烏可反。閜砢，相抉持也。　又【集韻】口我切，音可。義同。　又【正字通】音斝。亦大杯，受六升。

閜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
閜字的起名意思

暂无。

xiǎ
Splitting: "Yeah, humiliated."
Big Cup: "The small is the cup, the big is the big cup."
e
kě
〔閜砢(
Bent over: sharp waist. k?)] The appearance of overlapping and leaning, such as "Keng Heng Shui, hanging down to help sparse."
e
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiǎ］
["Guangyun" Xu cuts down, mounts, and dawns. ]
Also known as "閕1".
(1) Open appearance.
(2) Big cup.
[②] [ě]
["Ji Yun" Lean Ke cut, sing, shadow. ]
See "閜2砢".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xuji 1] [Door word department] 　閜; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 1333 28
[Tang Yun] Fire under the cut [Ji Yun] Xu Xia cut,? Yin 㗿. [Said the text] It's open. [Guang Yun] Big crack. [Bo Ya] 閜, open it. [Historical Records · Sima Xiangru Biography] 谽 呀 薜閜. [Note] Suddenly, counter-attack. Suo Yin said: Huo Ji, emptiness.　[Said Wen] The big cup is also a big shot. [Yangtze Dialect] Ji, the cup is also, the bigger one is called Zhi Ji. [Bo Ya] 閜, the cup is also. [Explanation] Hu Yaqie. Also 【Jiyun】Reliance can be cut. with?. [Said the text] The door is tilted. Or save. 【Historical Records·Sima Xiangru Biography】Heng Heng 閜砢. [Guo Pu's Note] The evil is reversible. Wu Henghe revealed the evil and turned the enemy's appearance. [Han Shu Annotation] 閜, Wu can be reversed.閜砢, stubbornness.　[Jiyun] I cut my mouth, the sound is OK. The same meaning.　[Zhengzitong] Sound Meng. Also big cup, by six liters.
